body:
Currently for CentOS, the last version available is CentOS 7. As the installed toolchain is getting relatively old, I was wondering what the support plans for later versions are, e.g. CentOS 8 (and possible follow-on project after end-of-life). 

Same question for Ubuntu for a Spack Docker-container for Focal Fossa.

- https://wiki.centos.org/About/Product
- https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases

Thanks
title: CentOS 8 docker container
